q: RECAP. 2010-11-03 http://wn.com/Detroit_Pistons_vs_Oklahoma_City_Thunder_Ray Allen_Allen Iverson_hits_Game_Winner_12/26/08 Having already scored a dozen points in the fourth quarter on Friday, Allen Iverson took things in his own hands.`` That was a great play by Ray Allen ,'' Pistons coach Michael Bruce Curry said. He hadn't had much going for him in the first three quarters, but then he took over the game. Detroit have taken eight straight against the Thunder, and haven't lost to the franchise at home since the former Seattle SuperSonics won 93-72 on Dec. 12, 2003.
